bug.author: wbwseeker
bug.summary: parser uses space tokens as heads
bug.description: The parser sometimes uses space tokens as heads. This should not happen, I think. I'll just put this here so we don't forget. I'll look into this myself as soon as I can.

comments.comment: This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
